text: Ilkka Taneli Kuusisto (26 April 1933 â€“ 20 February 2025) was a Finnish opera composer, conductor, choirmaster, and organist. He began his career as a church organist. He was choirmaster of the Finnish National Opera chorus and the Radio Symphony Chorus. He was general manager of the opera from 1984 and 1992. Kuusisto died on 20 February 2025, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Finnish composers Category:Conductors Category:Musicians from Helsinki
title: Ilkka Kuusisto
